metadata.description: Living in Waterbury in an aging inn wasn't Audrey's dream. It was her husband's. But now her husband is dead, and Audrey is the only one who thinks it wasn't an accident. She's also the only one who thinks the scarecrows scattered throughout the town have been moving. What's really going on in Waterbury? Audrey's about to find out.
metadata.name: 47 Decembers
